subtitle: today is the 20th day of the counting of
the Omer yesod of tarifit bonding in
compassion
for compassion to be truly realized it
needs bonding it requires creating a
channel between giver and receiver a
mutuality that extends beyond the moment
of need a bond that continues to live on
that is the most gratifying result of
true compassion
in the rabbi's book The Counting of the
Omer he asks some questions do you bond
with the one that you have compassion
for or do you remain apart
for me with the people closest to me I
do feel bonded
but I don't always with those in the
world that I don't know I have great
compassion and often sympathy and many
and most often empathy however I don't
always Bond
so on this day I want to make a more
eternal connection with the world
